Her legs were long and toned, ending in high heels that clicked ominously on the floor with each stride. Laura *joined the chant*: "Yes... You too will obey our Mistress, Gira. Just watch the swinging watch and listen to our voices. Obey... Obey..."

Gira *fought with everything he had left*: "N... No... What are you doing?! Snap out of it!"

Sandra *smirked, leaning forward so her breath touched Gira's ear*: "You're almost there... Just let go, Gira... Become one of us."
